g.text: Every journey starts with a publish.
The depot launches the event onto the route.
Scene 1: The bus leaving the depot with animations
The manifest maps the path, while debounce slows bursts at the light.
Manifest plans route; yellow light settles bursts (debounce)
Scene 2: Bus encountering first rules of the road with animations
Live and late subscribers both get the message, thanks to the Replay Cache.
First stop: live & late subscribers; Replay Cache hydrates latecomers
Scene 3: First subscriber stop and replay cache with animations
At the hub, events branch into sequences and plugins.
Special hub: topics route into sequences via Conductor (plugins)
Scene 4: Transfer hub and conductor with ramp animation
Guardrails, flags, throttle, and debounce enforce stability.
Street rules: enforced boundaries, flags, throttle & debounce lanes
Scene 5: Rules, boundaries, and street signs with traffic light animation
Events arrive at the school — the application state is updated.
Destination reached: application state updated (successful delivery)
